title: Quick reference
body:
## Icons & symbols > * Find a specific coin pair * Add a coin pair to (or remove it from) your favourites * The number of exchanges from which InterTrader gathered data for a pair * The difference between the lowest and highest buy price across all exchanges * The difference between the lowest and highest sell price across all exchanges * The potential profit at the time the price was retrieved by InterTrader (when *greyed out*, there's a problem with the coin or trading pair on at least one exchange) * There is a problem with the coin or the trading pair on one or more exchanges

## Glossary * **Exchange**: A Platform for trading currencies * **Intertrade**: Purchase a cryptocurrency on one exchange and sell it on another for profit * ** Coin pair, trading pair, crypocurrency pair, market**: Combination of two cryptocurrencies that can be traded on an exchange * **Buy/Bid price**: The price traders are willing to pay for a cryptocurrency * **Sell/Ask price**: The price traders are willing to sell a cryptocurrency * **Spread**: The difference between the buy and sell price of a trading pair on an exchange * **Buy spread, Buy difference (%)**: The difference between the lowest and highest bid price across all exchanges * **Sell spread, Sell difference (%)**: The difference between the lowest and highest ask price across all exchanges
